issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add test cases for NULL in joins as key values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The join implementation should be tested with nulls both on the build / probe side as key values.

The current implementation probably isn't 100% correct in handling null values, so the implementation probably needs to be adapted in order to handle null values.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11258?focusedCommentId=17332343) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/148
